description: If you're looking to add a little bit of spice to your life, this drink is sure to do the trick. It's&nbsp;sweet&nbsp;and creamy with just a hint of cinnamon and nutmeg for flavor. So get out that shaker and start mixing!
name: Spiced Maple Manhattan
recipeIngredient: ¼ oz. Vanilla, cinnamon, and maple syrup

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the rye whiskey, vermouth, maple syrup, vanilla, and bitters with the ice in a mixing glass. Stir well with a spoon.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the rye whiskey, vermouth, maple syrup, vanilla, and bitters with the ice in a mixing glass. Stir well with a spoon.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a lowball glass and garnish with the Maraschino cherries.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a lowball glass and garnish with the Maraschino cherries.
